item.title: LIVE: Iran retaliates against Israel: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: Padilla pushes back against Noem's claim he barged into news conference
item.description: California Sen. Alex Padilla continued to defend himself Friday and refute the claims that he crashed DHS Secretary Kristi Noem's news conference.

item.title: FDA expands approval of Moderna's RSV vaccine to some adults under age 60
item.description: The FDA expanded its approval of Moderna's RSV vaccine on Thursday to include adults under age 60 at increased risk of the disease.

item.title: Kilmar Abrego Garcia pleads not guilty to human smuggling charges

item.title: WATCH: Footage shows Tehran after Israel launches 'preemptive strike' against Iran
